#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;

ll work(ll x,ll y,ll b)
{
	if(y==0)	return 0;
	if(y==1)	return x;
	ll prev=work(x,y>>1,b);
	prev<<=1;
	if(prev>=b)	prev-=b;
	if(y&1)
	{
		prev+=x;
		if(prev>=b)	prev-=b;
	}
	return prev;
}

int main() {
	int test,i;
	ll n,x,y,b;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&b);
		ll ans=1;
		for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
		{
			ans=work(ans,i,2*b);
		}
		if(ans>=b)	cout<<"Odd\n";
		else			cout<<"Even\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
